text:
distortion invariance.
Convolutional networks combine three architectural ideas to ensure some degree
of shift and distortion invariance: local receptive ﬁelds, shared weights (or weight
replication), and, sometimes, spatial or temporal subsampling.
— Convolutional Networks for Images, Speech, and Time-Series , 1998.
